entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High plus 5 with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning early in the afternoon then changing to flurries at times heavy in the afternoon and ending late in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the morning then northwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High plus 5 with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
